member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadEventArgs.UserArgs
member.summary: Gets the user argument that were passed when the download was started.
member.returns: An object defined by the user

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.DownloadEventArgs
member.summary: Base event class for asynchronous download processes and provides the individual user argument. This class must be inherited.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadChangedEventArgs.ReceivedResultsCount
member.summary: The number of currently received results.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadChangedEventArgs.MaximumResultsCount
member.summary: The maximum number of received results.
member.remarks: If value is 0, all results will be downloaded

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadChangedEventArgs.Percentage
member.summary: The calculated percentage of download progress.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.DownloadChangedEventArgs
member.summary: Base event class for changed asynchronous download processes that provides additionally the response of the download. This class must be inherited.

member.name: P:MaasOne.Base.DownloadCompletedEventArgs.Response
member.summary: Gets the response of the download process.

member.name: T:MaasOne.Base.DownloadCompletedEventArgs
member.summary: Base event class for completed asynchronous download processes that provides additionally the response of the download. This class must be inherited.

member.name: P:MaasOne.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Gibt die zwischengespeicherte ResourceManager-Instanz zurück, die von dieser Klasse verwendet wird.

member.name: P:MaasOne.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Überschreibt die CurrentUICulture-Eigenschaft des aktuellen Threads für alle Ressourcenzuordnungen, die diese stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse verwenden.

member.name: T:MaasOne.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: Eine stark typisierte Ressourcenklasse zum Suchen von lokalisierten Zeichenfolgen usw.
